A Simple App for Testing APIs in the console

How to use:

  1. Open open dev tools with inspect after loading this document in the browser.

  2. Input an api endpoint you want to test in the API URL Input field.

  3. Add any required options in the Options Input field. USE JSON format and be sure to use "" for your key value pairs.
  4. Click Test API.

    5. NOTE: successful console logging means a CORS proxy server is not needed.
